name: Corpse Party: Blood Drive
overview: Can you break the curse that haunts Heavenly Host Elementary? Corpse Party: Blood Drive is the final installment of the Heavenly Host saga. As intrepid schoolgirl Ayumi Shinozaki, explore the decaying ruins of Heavenly Host Elementary and other locations in order to end a deadly curse once and for all. Along the way, solve puzzles, dodge traps, and run from malicious entities to avoid the Corpse Party series’ notorious 'Wrong Ends'.
